mapinfo.detailsText:
Welcome to Bangladesh. This region known for its many waterways and fertile plains. Players start on either side of the Meghna River. Udasi and/or Bhakti villages spawn in the North while the sea in the South provides an abundance of fish and whales. The trade route is not present in FFA. 
 ---------------------------------
 
 Natives: Bhakti 
 Outlaws: Dacoit and Thuggee 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Made by vividlyplain. 
 Observer ui by Aizamk.
